bio: By day, I'm a graphic designer for a New York City based investing startup, Betterment. I'm tasked with creating a brand that is clean, simple, and beautiful (everything your average financial institution is not!). By night, I write for my own site, curate all things geek, design cool stuff, and make a mean margarita. I'm inspired by awesome typography, gorgeous illustrations, and kick ass tattoos. Betterment Graphic Designer ING Group Graphic Designer ThermoSpas Graphic Designer
